files.content:
[h1]Changelog[/h1]

[h2]3.7.0 (2024-08-28)[/h2]


[h3]Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]rechunker:[/b] Images are now 1GB smaller and updates are up to 85% smaller thanks to the addition of [url=https://github.com/hhd-dev/rechunk]rechunker[/url].
[*] Add Discourse forums shortcut ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1403]#1403[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9b855ea499265497af9cfc915d4869687cb7b64b]9b855ea[/url])
[*] Add gamescope-legacy binary for older GPUs, such as Polaris. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b98f22216c19b7f6e6aa0a9a67a4fb8400de6121]b98f222[/url])
[*] Add Minisforum V3 as an HHD supported device ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/379b7e76e3036428097660485a8e22d9de08cbc8]379b7e7[/url])
[*] Add scx-sheds for optional schedulers, selectable via HHD ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/00931b256b8c798abe798265800f2c6498380a26]00931b2[/url])
[*] Add umu-launcher ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1b1ea4a4fdcff924fc1d5ada4be4e3f0ef685f05]1b1ea4a[/url])
[*] allow external scripts to specify nested-desktop/waydroid dimensions ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1508]#1508[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1d8a8b31cd52675a39e434b93ddd22f87a725c9a]1d8a8b3[/url])
[*] [b]bazzite-cli:[/b] add tealdeer as tldr ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1460]#1460[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1161cbb12b06cda05c90898e9f27748e1288f3be]1161cbb[/url])
[*] [b]cli:[/b] Alias [b]xdg-open[/b] to [b]open[/b] ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1494]#1494[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/fa8e6198da57a36b9e1038434c5f342fb3eb8ebb]fa8e619[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Improve default CPU frequency behavior on Galileo & Jupiter ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/7cd4ea1e80aaaafc7c1d21a261aaf37c202c495f]7cd4ea1[/url])
[*] Disable PPD when enabling HHD ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/135513e8270b67c07c88e618df62104ab05e435e]135513e[/url])
[*] [b]docs:[/b] Replace mdbook with mkdocs workflow ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1548]#1548[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/0e18978fe1bb58e54b1ff882ee563a18b6fdfe9c]0e18978[/url])
[*] Eliminate Steam Download Speed Fix  Game Mode Startup Video ujust commands, these are now handled by the bazzite-steam wrapper. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/373a73da8232589cb7cf57d4e0fd5764d67d5142]373a73d[/url])
[*] Enable faster QAM in HHD ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9b345e05a81af8b5a5df517758e2aea8fc7dd4ce]9b345e0[/url])
[*] [b]gnome:[/b] Add Tiling Shell extension ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/aa8ae933b4084633fa20441158f2efd51443bd9e]aa8ae93[/url])
[*] [b]gnome:[/b] increase check-alive-timeout ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/733d73a6823ba25ed7cf0e5387a870408c1027cb]733d73a[/url])
[*] [b]just:[/b] add decky prerelease option ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1425]#1425[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/d901c49e03b204078b75133eb70470ff621ce318]d901c49[/url])
[*] [b]just:[/b] add ujust to reset steam ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1411]#1411[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b3a06586739938b58d1e1ce2637b1f3e97610e0a]b3a0658[/url])
[*] [b]kde:[/b] add fcitx5-hangul for Korean input ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1399]#1399[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/858f6bfc826ae4ff83f92eb2a9432b44a202c6e2]858f6bf[/url])
[*] [b]kde:[/b] Add krdp ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/e5feab396008b467d60d0161f823a4dbb2247cd5]e5feab3[/url])
[*] [b]kernel:[/b] Enable full preemption by default, reduces latency in certain workloads. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/6fcd085db4cf5d2a42440439588e703ce82aea1e]6fcd085[/url])
[*] [b]nvidia:[/b] add script check for legacy nvidia hardware ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1428]#1428[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/d88b9bcbeda114f043d994fc51997c622c7fe0e3]d88b9bc[/url])
[*] Prepare mdBook workflow for documentation ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1441]#1441[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/181497bc1741418ad580f5f464f5e6916d22d4f4]181497b[/url])
[*] [b]rechunk:[/b] enable previous layer checks to improve successive downloads and version bump ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1443]#1443[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/11b1ebaa8336196f12dd6f2bd503def49ff41e7d]11b1eba[/url])
[*] [b]rechunk:[/b] Introduce image rechunking to lower update sizes ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1439]#1439[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/54fad6162643d3f9d5e4cf04e9118534c82e59c2]54fad61[/url])
[*] standardize versioning across OSTree and os-release ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1442]#1442[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/677891a8bb2c1b0b0d2d3ad1212530cb449547f7]677891a[/url])
[*] Switch to scx-scheds package for additional sched_ext schedulers ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ccd7b52221e1a0971aeb9ace17fdc262108d8865]ccd7b52[/url])
[*] [b]ujust:[/b] add post-gamescope-logs ujust ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1533]#1533[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/0bba7d316b8bd7525bf755dbe3c20ad0e98cfcba]0bba7d3[/url])
[/list]

[h3]Bug Fixes[/h3]
[list]
[*] Add fix for docking and a crash for certain inputs to Gamescope ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b2f0b558ba9a8bc2e55374d5957ecdaed4dcdd19]b2f0b55[/url])
[*] Add support for AYANEO NEXT series in Anaconda ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b3e9de3d8c81ca9408c59502b88500f7288ebc8c]b3e9de3[/url])
[*] Allow more time for SD card mounting, required by some hardware. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/810b84e706bd6267085adc224066d8b679f58722]810b84e[/url])
[*] [b]Ally X:[/b] prefer HDMI audio when docked ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1467]#1467[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/398ba21624ac17e4ef0d6313b73aecaa9168c3ff]398ba21[/url])
[*] [b]ally:[/b] Fix VRR stutter ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/8c6379dccf2a98e6b364f152405561cd7c6d85a0]8c6379d[/url])
[*] Always require fuse for AppImage support ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/0830b5ae68120919e1746382f2d842c5156516fe]0830b5a[/url])
[*] Correct control+1/control+2 input in gamescope (Thanks [url=https://github.com/hhd-dev]@hhd-dev[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/6ef9d14a56d33bee0e9cc39631f098c7da8f7a10]6ef9d14[/url])
[*] Correct default TimeoutStopSec of Decky Loader ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/7dec5f93e42953d4665550419ea145c3e5967a0c]7dec5f9[/url])
[*] Correct EFI path issue with fwupd ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ac457f07ee458d589261db05f608bd4089ef8cb4]ac457f0[/url])
[*] Correct missing directory error when running grub2-switch-to-blscfg ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/e93fa00833104a1a558cca21bc05be2f4bcfd65d]e93fa00[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Ensure the branch is lowercase and trimmed in os-branch-select ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/c8bc7266914bedb1193060d1122ff52115a3c415]c8bc726[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Remove branch selector mark file on reboot ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ea2826946280442e93bc06ce0e22b152af936991]ea28269[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Temporarily drop mura package due to framerate pacing issue introduced by it's application ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/78c10a2ab9a7ede3833ccc42da2201dbc2b8b885]78c10a2[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Use bootstrap copy of Steam when starting Steam for the first time on the desktop ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/0680e56083475e38d51b60e93c4f1296f89ffd68]0680e56[/url])
[*] Disable pipewire camera handling temporarily ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/8c1356c322463fd27cc7c3966164f23aa08cf581]8c1356c[/url])
[*] Disable Waydroid updater in topgrade ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ee163e5737e23f174d54a837fcb2787b98a15a0b]ee163e5[/url])
[*] Drop no longer needed OBS_USE_EGL environment variable ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/d658a7a7c4eb4185e6afbba0afbfff04863371e0]d658a7a[/url])
[*] [b]just:[/b] add libvirt package to setup-virtualization ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1549]#1549[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1cb85551d509213614ce21c8af515eb1249d0f03]1cb8555[/url])
[*] [b]just:[/b] fix syntax for benchmark ujust ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1451]#1451[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ecfc56d1fa6b89aa5eb9bbcbe0b8ea2ae7dfab38]ecfc56d[/url])
[*] [b]kde:[/b] Correct size of ptyxis window ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/c27c83ea5f0637ca6c47a39207fafe4972b191e9]c27c83e[/url])
[*] [b]LGO:[/b] reduce input source priority and add description ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1452]#1452[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/371ff845a17fd5ed55c5ca92bbc5e4663e29645e]371ff84[/url])
[*] Limit BTRFS deduplication to one core. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/bd85e7d33001a8783b8b97984ced138819c52784]bd85e7d[/url])
[*] [b]nvidia:[/b] Add fix for ALVR (Thanks Crunchn) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/52d6189e7541caa59bfc90f0119acda06232bc6a]52d6189[/url])
[*] [b]polaris:[/b] Add 720p patch ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9ba34b0fa0dc488527d3801862bb045d4a354af9]9ba34b0[/url])
[*] Prevent bluetooth preventing suspension ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1446]#1446[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9f2550f3982664da6c22e2e4cf32da4d937ca5ff]9f2550f[/url])
[*] Prevent restoring audio levels on hardware with custom DSPs ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/20eb99edaaec143e149befb523380a66ba5bd83f]20eb99e[/url])
[*] [b]rechunk:[/b] use correct previous ref ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1509]#1509[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/e9a8b793c0cef5c6c66511946c55e4980f7e4322]e9a8b79[/url])
[*] Remove files now handled by steamdeck-dsp ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/82f66e8da9633acd52bd5ef9529f11f2932bc712]82f66e8[/url])
[*] Remove pip installed packages and use newly made rpm packages, fixes python errors when layering some packages. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/5ec9e555f8241214333cc28ec697033ae56dc52f]5ec9e55[/url])
[*] Use new Steam bootstrap file from Nobara (Thanks @GloriousEggroll) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/dccb5d2d059416fbea02e4fc0cf48a2ac75bcfb2]dccb5d2[/url])
[/list]

[h3]Miscellaneous Chores[/h3]
[list]
[*] release 3.7.0 ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/3acbbd0c13cb688e53abd2dc0844f8c87ce0b570]3acbbd0[/url])
[/list]

[h3]Miscellaneous Chores[/h3]
[list]
[*] release 3.7.0 ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/3acbbd0c13cb688e53abd2dc0844f8c87ce0b570]3acbbd0[/url])
[/list]
[h2][url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/compare/v3.5.1...v3.6.0]3.6.0[/url] (2024-07-17)[/h2]


[h3]Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] Add adaptive brightness script for handhelds other than the deck. Default disabled (Thanks [url=https://github.com/corando98]@corando98[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/996d161bfb27432e1bd396236c63e932b5d8e981]996d161[/url])
[*] Add offline documentation (markdown version) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1364]#1364[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/988928610a37694a5223f7d09499d737af3790c5]9889286[/url])
[*] Add scx_lavd as an optional scheduler ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/00931b256b8c798abe798265800f2c6498380a26]00931b2[/url])
[*] [b]ally-x:[/b] Add Texas Instruments Firmware file from Windows driver. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/ba063deecf4d55498bb15ed3f94cb42322017b7a]ba063de[/url])
[*] [b]ally:[/b] Add audio improvements from Aru's repo ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/245305def4f3a883b762d1168b9ac13b8dea2972]245305d[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Use Deck logo in logo menu by default on Valve hardware ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/df41081f93fb00459c9eac42d84d605cca622b3e]df41081[/url])
[*] Disable PPD when enabling HHD ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/135513e8270b67c07c88e618df62104ab05e435e]135513e[/url])
[*] Install [b]wqy-zenhei-fonts[/b] for GoldSrc Engine to display Chinese fonts. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1367]#1367[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/af8d26c2bb8af02e9032891f959e2f5aba96a8c1]af8d26c[/url])
[*] [b]legion:[/b] Add DSP ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/5331671e615e87f701d4f3bf1bfae38cc41aa357]5331671[/url])
[*] [b]legion:[/b] Add Optional ICC Color Profile ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/c87964e7f4f4cefb8e58a90fbd2392bee2a52438]c87964e[/url])
[*] Reduce CPU & IO priority of updates from game mode ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9026ded109cd2046872d7bc93932570342e6f38d]9026ded[/url])
[*] [b]ujust:[/b] Add install-resolve ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1336]#1336[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/60e76d04f94f3794618215a65928f19ff1e1686a]60e76d0[/url])
[/list]

[h3]Bug Fixes[/h3]
[list]
[*] Add patch for color issues in the latest Mesa. ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/69be913abe8def28eac6b6ed20bf5cbadf4627fb]69be913[/url])
[*] [b]ally-x:[/b] Disable amd_pmf driver for HHD TDP controls to work ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/057aaa418b267749b76a6ba98459d7c2cf070146]057aaa4[/url])
[*] [b]ally:[/b] Correct issue with audio channels in DSP ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/a93037d5161ed5e93e24c406381a54bde02881f5]a93037d[/url])
[*] [b]Containerfile:[/b] Correct regex when installing fsync kernel ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b24e44be7e5351e48472f5e47ad81d7ac2f79126]b24e44b[/url])
[*] [b]Containerfile:[/b] Remove duplicate overrides for kernel modules ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9cc2c03af4e57177d7edd44b8f3bfc4a993c61d2]9cc2c03[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Add patch to fix some invalid refresh rates (Thanks [url=https://github.com/matte]@matte[/url]_schwartz) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/3ca09c587dd596d0a9b9be7d60d33a9d82ff5fbb]3ca09c5[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Set volume of original output to 100% to fix low volume under DSP ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/fe162863b07bdf7bf29c48278ef2581d65a7f3ad]fe16286[/url])
[*] [b]deck:[/b] Use older pattern matching for priv-write ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/96431f32711fed41a1f1c3361cd7855b15e1f5aa]96431f3[/url])
[*] [b]GPD:[/b] add udev rules for disabling GPD fingerprint sensors ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1362]#1362[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/c0e82bf46d02e255063158139a6f10c7fff3b222]c0e82bf[/url])
[*] Make bazzite-tdpfix never run on deck hardware ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b2aa3b45baba2ce447a41e3c75fbd3ba17a6d4ee]b2aa3b4[/url])
[*] [b]nvidia:[/b] Disable GSP on -nvidia builds until performance issue is addressed upstream ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/a94df08908b374757e035a4a53996e8984225a50]a94df08[/url])
[*] Restore libei in gamescope ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/7b57725d3bf8d6c04027e537ec2338daeb40f9ce]7b57725[/url])
[*] [b]ujust:[/b] Fix faulty ujust install-resolve ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1342]#1342[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/14ee75d7c8e8f3116a4ab3388c4f65607997027c]14ee75d[/url])
[*] [b]ujust:[/b] set install as the default action for the setup-decky ujust ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1371]#1371[/url]) ([url=https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/825c70ff38ff7a77655a63c5f047ca352c48d2a8]825c70f[/url])
[/list]

# Changelog

## 3.7.0 (2024-08-28)


### Features

* **rechunker:** Images are now 1GB smaller and updates are up to 85% smaller thanks to the addition of [rechunker](https://github.com/hhd-dev/rechunk).
* Add Discourse forums shortcut ([#1403](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1403)) ([9b855ea](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/9b855ea499265497af9cfc915d4869687cb7b64b))
* Add gamescope-legacy binary for older GPUs, such as Polaris. ([b98f222](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/b98f22216c19b7f6e6aa0a9a67a4fb8400de6121))
* Add Minisforum V3 as an HHD supported device ([379b7e7](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/379b7e76e3036428097660485a8e22d9de08cbc8))
* Add scx-sheds for optional schedulers, selectable via HHD ([00931b2](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/00931b256b8c798abe798265800f2c6498380a26))
* Add umu-launcher ([1b1ea4a](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1b1ea4a4fdcff924fc1d5ada4be4e3f0ef685f05))
* allow external scripts to specify nested-desktop/waydroid dimensions ([#1508](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1508)) ([1d8a8b3](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1d8a8b31cd52675a39e434b93ddd22f87a725c9a))
* **bazzite-cli:** add tealdeer as tldr ([#1460](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1460)) ([1161cbb](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/1161cbb12b06cda05c90898e9f27748e1288f3be))
* **cli:** Alias `xdg-open` to `open` ([#1494](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/issues/1494)) ([fa8e619](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/commit/fa8e6198da57a36b9e1038434c5f342fb3eb8ebb))

files.content:
ARG BASE_IMAGE_NAME="${BASE_IMAGE_NAME:-kinoite}"
ARG BASE_IMAGE_FLAVOR="${BASE_IMAGE_FLAVOR:-main}"
ARG IMAGE_FLAVOR="${IMAGE_FLAVOR:-main}"
ARG NVIDIA_FLAVOR="${NVIDIA_FLAVOR:-nvidia}"
ARG NVIDIA_BASE="${NVIDIA_BASE:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_FLAVOR="${KERNEL_FLAVOR:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_VERSION="${KERNEL_VERSION:-6.12.5-204.bazzite.fc41.x86_64}"
ARG IMAGE_BRANCH="${IMAGE_BRANCH:-main}"
ARG SOURCE_IMAGE="${SOURCE_IMAGE:-$BASE_IMAGE_NAME-$BASE_IMAGE_FLAVOR}"
ARG BASE_IMAGE="ghcr.io/ublue-os/${SOURCE_IMAGE}"
ARG FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION="${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION:-41}"
ARG JUPITER_FIRMWARE_VERSION="${JUPITER_FIRMWARE_VERSION:-jupiter-20241205.1}"
ARG SHA_HEAD_SHORT="${SHA_HEAD_SHORT}"
ARG VERSION_TAG="${VERSION_TAG}"
ARG VERSION_PRETTY="${VERSION_PRETTY}"

FROM ghcr.io/ublue-os/${KERNEL_FLAVOR}-kernel:${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION}-${KERNEL_VERSION} AS kernel
FROM ghcr.io/ublue-os/akmods:${KERNEL_FLAVOR}-${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION}-${KERNEL_VERSION} AS akmods
FROM ghcr.io/ublue-os/akmods-extra:${KERNEL_FLAVOR}-${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION}-${KERNEL_VERSION} AS akmods-extra

FROM ${BASE_IMAGE}:${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION} AS bazzite

ARG IMAGE_NAME="${IMAGE_NAME:-bazzite}"
ARG IMAGE_VENDOR="${IMAGE_VENDOR:-ublue-os}"
ARG IMAGE_FLAVOR="${IMAGE_FLAVOR:-main}"
ARG NVIDIA_FLAVOR="${NVIDIA_FLAVOR:-nvidia}"
ARG NVIDIA_BASE="${NVIDIA_BASE:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_FLAVOR="${KERNEL_FLAVOR:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_VERSION="${KERNEL_VERSION:-6.12.5-204.bazzite.fc41.x86_64}"
ARG IMAGE_BRANCH="${IMAGE_BRANCH:-main}"
ARG BASE_IMAGE_NAME="${BASE_IMAGE_NAME:-kinoite}"
ARG FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION="${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION:-41}"
ARG JUPITER_FIRMWARE_VERSION="${JUPITER_FIRMWARE_VERSION:-jupiter-20241205.1}"
ARG SHA_HEAD_SHORT="${SHA_HEAD_SHORT}"
ARG VERSION_TAG="${VERSION_TAG}"
ARG VERSION_PRETTY="${VERSION_PRETTY}"

COPY system_files/desktop/shared system_files/desktop/${BASE_IMAGE_NAME} /

# Update packages that commonly cause build issues

# Dock updater - done manually due to proprietary parts preventing it from being on Copr
# Neptune firmware - done manually due to "TBD" license on needed audio firmware
RUN --mount=type=cache,dst=/var/cache/rpm-ostree \
    rpm-ostree install \
    jupiter-fan-control \
    jupiter-hw-support-btrfs \
    steamdeck-dsp \
    powerbuttond \
    hhd \
    hhd-ui \
    adjustor \
    acpica-tools \
    vpower \
    ds-inhibit \
    steam_notif_daemon \
    sdgyrodsu \
    ibus-pinyin \
    ibus-table-chinese-cangjie \
    ibus-table-chinese-quick \
    socat \
    zstd \
    zenity \
    newt \
    qt6-qtvirtualkeyboard \
    xorg-x11-server-Xvfb \
    python-vdf \
    python-crcmod && \
    git clone https://gitlab.com/evlaV/jupiter-dock-updater-bin.git \
        --depth 1 \
        /tmp/jupiter-dock-updater-bin && \
    mv -v /tmp/jupiter-dock-updater-bin/packaged/usr/lib/jupiter-dock-updater /usr/libexec/jupiter-dock-updater && \
    rm -rf /tmp/jupiter-dock-updater-bin && \
    ln -s /usr/bin/steamos-logger /usr/bin/steamos-info && \
    ln -s /usr/bin/steamos-logger /usr/bin/steamos-notice && \
    ln -s /usr/bin/steamos-logger /usr/bin/steamos-warning && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    ostree container commit

# Install Steam Deck patched UPower, remove Tuned GUI
RUN --mount=type=cache,dst=/var/cache/rpm-ostree \
    rpm-ostree override replace \
    --experimental \
    --from repo=copr:copr.fedorainfracloud.org:kylegospo:bazzite \
        upower \
        upower-libs && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    ostree container commit

# Install Gamescope Session & Supporting changes
# Add bootstrap_steam.tar.gz used by gamescope-session (Thanks GE & Nobara Project!)
RUN --mount=type=cache,dst=/var/cache/rpm-ostree \
    mkdir -p /usr/share/gamescope-session-plus/ && \
    curl -Lo /usr/share/gamescope-session-plus/bootstrap_steam.tar.gz https://large-package-sources.nobaraproject.org/bootstrap_steam.tar.gz && \
    rpm-ostree install \
        gamescope-session-plus \
        gamescope-session-steam && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    ostree container commit

# Cleanup & Finalize
RUN /usr/libexec/containerbuild/image-info && \
    mkdir -p "/etc/xdg/autostart" && \
    mv "/etc/skel/.config/autostart/steam.desktop" "/etc/xdg/autostart/steam.desktop" && \
    sed -i 's@Exec=waydroid first-launch@Exec=/usr/bin/waydroid-launcher first-launch\nX-Steam-Library-Capsule=/usr/share/applications/Waydroid/capsule.png\nX-Steam-Library-Hero=/usr/share/applications/Waydroid/hero.png\nX-Steam-Library-Logo=/usr/share/applications/Waydroid/logo.png\nX-Steam-Library-StoreCapsule=/usr/share/applications/Waydroid/store-logo.png\nX-Steam-Controller-Template=Desktop@g' /usr/share/applications/Waydroid.desktop && \
    if grep -q "kinoite" <<< "${BASE_IMAGE_NAME}"; then \
        sed -i 's/Exec=.*/Exec=systemctl start return-to-gamemode.service/' /etc/skel/Desktop/Return.desktop && \
        mkdir -p /usr/share/ublue-os/backup && \
        mv /usr/share/applications/com.github.maliit.keyboard.desktop /usr/share/ublue-os/backup/com.github.maliit.keyboard.desktop \
    ; fi && \
    sed -i 's@\[Desktop Entry\]@\[Desktop Entry\]\nNoDisplay=true@g' /usr/share/applications/input-remapper-gtk.desktop && \
    cp "/usr/share/ublue-os/firstboot/yafti.yml" "/etc/yafti.yml" && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_ublue-os-akmods.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_kylegospo-bazzite.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_kylegospo-bazzite-multilib.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_kylegospo-latencyflex.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_kylegospo-obs-vkcapture.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_kylegospo-wallpaper-engine-kde-plugin.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_hhd-dev-hhd.repo && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/_copr_ycollet-audinux.repo && \
    if grep -q "silverblue" <<< "${BASE_IMAGE_NAME}"; then \
        systemctl disable gdm.service && \
        systemctl enable sddm.service \
    ; fi && \
    if grep -q "silverblue" <<< "${BASE_IMAGE_NAME}"; then \
      mkdir -p "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/deck-silverblue/" && \
      cp "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/zz0-"*"-bazzite-deck-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/deck-silverblue/" && \
      find "/etc/dconf/db/distro.d/" -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec cp {} "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/deck-silverblue/" \; && \
      dconf-override-converter to-dconf "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/deck-silverblue/zz0-"*"-bazzite-deck-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" && \
      rm "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/deck-silverblue/zz0-"*"-bazzite-deck-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" \
    ; else \
      systemctl disable usr-share-sddm-themes.mount \
    ; fi && \
    mkdir -p /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    find "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/" -type f ! -name "*.gschema.override" -exec cp {} "/tmp/bazzite-schema-test/" \; && \
    cp "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/zz0-"*".gschema.override" "/tmp/bazzite-schema-test/" && \
    echo "Running error test for Bazzite Deck gschema override. Aborting if failed." && \
    glib-compile-schemas --strict /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    echo "Compiling gschema to include Bazzite Deck setting overrides" && \
    glib-compile-schemas /usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas &>/dev/null && \
    rm -r /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    echo "Removing Steam BPM workaround .desktop file" && \
    { rm -v /usr/share/applications/bazzite-steam-bpm.desktop || true; } && \
    systemctl enable bazzite-autologin.service && \
    systemctl enable wireplumber-workaround.service && \
    systemctl enable wireplumber-sysconf.service && \
    systemctl enable pipewire-workaround.service && \
    systemctl enable pipewire-sysconf.service && \
    systemctl enable ds-inhibit.service && \
    systemctl enable cec-onboot.service && \
    systemctl enable cec-onpoweroff.service && \
    systemctl enable cec-onsleep.service && \
    systemctl enable bazzite-tdpfix.service && \
    systemctl enable bazzite-grub-boot-success.timer && \
    systemctl enable bazzite-grub-boot-success.service && \
    systemctl --global disable sdgyrodsu.service && \
    systemctl --global disable grub-boot-success.timer && \
    systemctl disable grub-boot-indeterminate.service && \
    systemctl disable input-remapper.service && \
    systemctl disable ublue-update.timer && \
    systemctl disable jupiter-fan-control.service && \
    systemctl disable vpower.service && \
    systemctl disable jupiter-biosupdate.service && \
    systemctl disable jupiter-controller-update.service && \
    systemctl disable batterylimit.service && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    mkdir -p /var/tmp && chmod 1777 /var/tmp && \
    ostree container commit

FROM ghcr.io/ublue-os/akmods-${NVIDIA_FLAVOR}:${KERNEL_FLAVOR}-${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION}-${KERNEL_VERSION} AS nvidia-akmods

FROM ${NVIDIA_BASE} AS bazzite-nvidia

ARG IMAGE_NAME="${IMAGE_NAME:-bazzite-nvidia}"
ARG IMAGE_VENDOR="${IMAGE_VENDOR:-ublue-os}"
ARG IMAGE_FLAVOR="${IMAGE_FLAVOR:-nvidia}"
ARG NVIDIA_FLAVOR="${NVIDIA_FLAVOR:-nvidia}"
ARG NVIDIA_BASE="${NVIDIA_BASE:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_FLAVOR="${KERNEL_FLAVOR:-bazzite}"
ARG KERNEL_VERSION="${KERNEL_VERSION:-6.12.5-204.bazzite.fc41.x86_64}"
ARG IMAGE_BRANCH="${IMAGE_BRANCH:-main}"
ARG BASE_IMAGE_NAME="${BASE_IMAGE_NAME:-kinoite}"
ARG FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION="${FEDORA_MAJOR_VERSION:-41}"
ARG VERSION_TAG="${VERSION_TAG}"
ARG VERSION_PRETTY="${VERSION_PRETTY}"

# Fetch NVIDIA driver
COPY system_files/nvidia/shared system_files/nvidia/${BASE_IMAGE_NAME} /

# Remove everything that doesn't work well with NVIDIA
RUN --mount=type=cache,dst=/var/cache/rpm-ostree \
    rpm-ostree override remove \
        rocm-hip \
        rocm-opencl \
        rocm-clinfo && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    ostree container commit

# Install NVIDIA driver
RUN --mount=type=cache,dst=/var/cache/rpm-ostree \
    --mount=type=bind,from=nvidia-akmods,src=/rpms,dst=/tmp/akmods-rpms \
    sed -i 's@enabled=0@enabled=1@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/negativo17-fedora-multimedia.repo && \
    rpm-ostree install \
        mesa-vdpau-drivers.x86_64 \
        mesa-vdpau-drivers.i686 && \
    curl -Lo /tmp/nvidia-install.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ublue-os/hwe/main/nvidia-install.sh && \
    chmod +x /tmp/nvidia-install.sh && \
    IMAGE_NAME="${BASE_IMAGE_NAME}" /tmp/nvidia-install.sh && \
    rm -f /usr/share/vulkan/icd.d/nouveau_icd.*.json && \
    ln -s libnvidia-ml.so.1 /usr/lib64/libnvidia-ml.so && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    ostree container commit

# Cleanup & Finalize
RUN echo "import \"/usr/share/ublue-os/just/95-bazzite-nvidia.just\"" >> /usr/share/ublue-os/justfile && \
    sed -i 's@enabled=1@enabled=0@g' /etc/yum.repos.d/negativo17-fedora-multimedia.repo && \
    if grep -q "silverblue" <<< "${BASE_IMAGE_NAME}"; then \
      mkdir -p "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/nvidia-silverblue/" && \
      cp "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/zz0-"*"-bazzite-nvidia-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/nvidia-silverblue/" && \
      dconf-override-converter to-dconf "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/nvidia-silverblue/zz0-"*"-bazzite-nvidia-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" && \
      rm "/usr/share/ublue-os/dconfs/nvidia-silverblue/zz0-"*"-bazzite-nvidia-silverblue-"*".gschema.override" \
    ; fi && \
    mkdir -p /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    find "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/" -type f ! -name "*.gschema.override" -exec cp {} "/tmp/bazzite-schema-test/" \; && \
    cp "/usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/zz0-"*".gschema.override" "/tmp/bazzite-schema-test/" && \
    echo "Running error test for Bazzite Nvidia gschema override. Aborting if failed." && \
    glib-compile-schemas --strict /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    echo "Compiling gschema to include Bazzite Nvidia setting overrides" && \
    glib-compile-schemas /usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas &>/dev/null && \
    rm -r /tmp/bazzite-schema-test && \
    mkdir -p /var/tmp && chmod 1777 /var/tmp && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/image-info && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/build-initramfs && \
    /usr/libexec/containerbuild/cleanup.sh && \
    mkdir -p /var/tmp && chmod 1777 /var/tmp && \
    ostree container commit

files.name: Justfile
files.content:
export project_root := `git rev-parse --show-toplevel`
export git_branch := ` git branch --show-current`
export latest := "41"
export default_image := "kinoite"
export default_target := "bazzite"

alias build-iso := build-iso-release
alias run := run-container

_default:
    @just --list

_container_mgr:
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/container_mgr.sh

_tag image:
    @echo {{image}}-build

# Check Just Syntax
just-check:
    #!/usr/bin/bash
    find "${project_root}" -type f -name "*.just" | while read -r file; do
    	echo "Checking syntax: $file"
    	just --unstable --fmt --check -f $file
    done
    just --unstable --fmt --check -f ${project_root}/Justfile

# Fix Just Syntax
[private]
just-fix:
    #!/usr/bin/bash
    find "${project_root}" -type f -name "*.just" | while read -r file; do
    	echo "Checking syntax: $file"
    	just --unstable --fmt -f $file
    done
    just --unstable --fmt -f ${project_root}/Justfile

# Build image
build target="" image="":
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/build-image.sh {{target}} {{image}} 

# Build ISO
build-iso-release target="" image="":
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/build-iso.sh {{target}} {{image}} 

# Build ISO using ISO Builder Git Head
build-iso-git target="" image="":
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/build-iso-installer-main.sh {{target}} {{image}}

# Run ISO
run-iso target="" image="":
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/run-iso.sh {{target}} {{image}}

# Run Container
run-container target="" image="":
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/run-image.sh {{target}} {{image}}

# List Images
list-images:
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/list-images.sh

# Clean Images
clean-images:
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/cleanup-images.sh

# Clean ISOs
clean-isos:
    @{{ project_root }}/just_scripts/cleanup-dir.sh

--- # ndice - [Sobre \& Recursos](#sobre--recursos) - [Desktops](#desktops) - [Steam Deck/PCs Centros de Mdia (HTPCs)](#steam-deckpcs-centros-de-mdia-htpcs) - [Portteis Alternativos](#portteis-alternativos) - [GNOME](#gnome) - [Recursos Upstream](#recursos-upstream) - [Universal Blue](#universal-blue) - [Recursos do Fedora Linux (Kinoite \& Silverblue)](#recursos-do-fedora-linux-kinoite--silverblue) - [Porqu](#porqu) - [Imagens](#imagens) - [Documentao](#documentao) - [Pacotes Customizados](#pacotes-customizados) - [Verificao](#verificao) - [Secure Boot](#secure-boot) - [Mtricas de Contribuio](#mtricas-de-contribuio) - [Histrico de Estrelas](#histrico-de-estrelas) - [Agradecimentos Especiais](#agradecimentos-especiais) - [Faa Sua Prpria](#faa-sua-prpria) - [Junte-se Comunidade](#junte-se--comunidade) --- ## Sobre & Recursos [Entre no nosso site](https://bazzite.gg/) para ler uma explicao do Bazzite mais amigvel a iniciantes. Este README uma explicao aprofundada. [Bazzite](https://bazzite.gg/) uma imagem OCI que serve como sistema operacional alternativo para o [Steam Deck](https://www.steamdeck.com/), e um parecido com o SteamOS e pronto pra jogar para computadores desktop e PCs centros de mdia. O Bazzite feito a partir do [ublue-os/main](https://github.com/ublue-os/main) e do [ublue-os/nvidia](https://github.com/ublue-os/nvidia) utilizando tecnologia [Fedora](https://fedoraproject.org/), o que significa que suporte expandido a hardware e drivers esto inclusos. Suplementarmente, o Bazzite traz os seguintes recursos: - Usa o [kernel bazzite](https://github.com/hhd-dev/kernel-bazzite) para possibilitar HDR e expandir o suporte a hardware, dentre outros vrios patches - baseado no [kernel fsync](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/kernel-fsync/). - HDR disponvel no Game mode. - NVK disponvel em verses no-Nvidia. - Suporte completo decodificao de hardware em codecs H264. - Suporte completo aos run-times OpenCL/HIP ROCM da AMD. - Driver [xone](https://github.com/medusalix/xone) para controles de Xbox. - Suporte completo a [DisplayLink](https://www.synaptics.com/products/displaylink-graphics). - Inclui os temas do SteamOS para KDE da Valve. - Inclui temas GTK3/4 semelhantes ao Vapor e VGUI2 do SteamOS. Instale o [Gradience](https://flathub.org/apps/com.github.GradienceTeam.Gradience) para us-los. - [LatencyFleX](https://github.com/ishitatsuyuki/LatencyFleX), [vkBasalt](https://github.com/DadSchoorse/vkBasalt), [MangoHud](https://github.com/flightlessmango/Mangohud), e [OBS VkCapture](https://github.com/nowrep/obs-vkcapture) instalados e disponveis por padro. - [Switcheroo-Control com patches](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/switcheroo-control_discrete/) que consertam a troca entre iGPU/dGPU em casos em que quebrada por padro. - Suporte a [Wallpaper Engine](https://www.wallpaperengine.io/en). (S no KDE) - [Extenso do shell ROM Properties Page](https://github.com/GerbilSoft/rom-properties) inclusa. - Suporte completo a [Winesync/Fastsync/NTsync](https://github.com/Frogging-Family/wine-tkg-git/issues/936). - [Distrobox](https://github.com/89luca89/distrobox) pr-instalado com atualizaes automticas pra containers criados pelo usurio. - Instalao simplificada do Davinci Resolve usando o [davincibox](https://github.com/zelikos/davincibox) (`ujust install-resolve`) - [Ptyxis Terminal](https://gitlab.gnome.org/chergert/ptyxis) utilizado como terminal padro em todas as imagens. Esse terminal feito especialmente para o workflow em containers que voc deve usar no Bazzite. Se quiser utilizar o KDE Konsole ou o GNOME Console, eles podem ser instalados via Flatpak. - Servio `duperemove` automatizado para reduzir o espao em disco usado por arquivos em prefixos do wine. - Suporte a HDMI CEC via [libCEC](https://libcec.pulse-eight.com/). - Usa o [controle de congestionamento TCP BBR da Google](https://github.com/google/bbr) por padro. - [Input Remapper](https://github.com/sezanzeb/input-remapper) pr-instalado e habilitado. (Disponvel mas desabilitado por padro na verso Deck, ative executando `ujust _restore-input-remapper`) - O Bazzite Portal traz um jeito simples de instalar mltiplos aplicativos e ajustes, incluindo a instalao do [LACT](https://github.com/ilya-zlobintsev/LACT). - [Waydroid](https://waydro.id/) pr-instalado para rodar aplicativos Android. Confira esse [guia rpido](https://docs.bazzite.gg/Installing_and_Managing_Software/Waydroid_Setup_Guide/) para configur-lo. - Gerencie aplicativos usando o [Flatseal](https://github.com/tchx84/Flatseal), [Warehouse](https://github.com/flattool/warehouse), e [Gear Lever](https://github.com/mijorus/gearlever). - Drivers i2c-piix4 e i2c-nct6775 pra [OpenRGB](https://gitlab.com/CalcProgrammer1/OpenRGB) para controlar o RGB em certas placas-me. - Drivers [OpenRazer](https://openrazer.github.io) inclusos, Selecione OpenRazer no Bazzite Portal ou rode `ujust install-openrazer` no terminal para comear a us-lo. - Regras de udev para [OpenTabletDriver](https://opentabletdriver.net/) inclusas, com a instalalo completa disponvel via Bazzite Portal ou rodando `ujust install-opentabletdriver` no terminal. - Suporte por padro a teclados [Wooting](https://wooting.io/). - Suporte por padro a GPUs Southern Islands (HD 7000) e Sea Islands (HD 8000) da AMD por meio do driver `amdgpu`. - [XwaylandVideoBridge](https://invent.kde.org/system/xwaylandvideobridge) disponvel pra compartilhamento de tela no Discord em Wayland. - [Webapp Manager](https://github.com/linuxmint/webapp-manager) incluso para criar aplicativos a partir de sites com vrios browsers, inclusive o Firefox. ### Desktops Imagem genrica disponvel como `bazzite`, prpria para computadores desktop. - Atualiza automaticamente o sistema, Flatpaks, e todos os containers Distrobox - via [ublue-update](https://github.com/ublue-os/ublue-update) e [topgrade](https://github.com/topgrade-rs/topgrade). > [!IMPORTANT] > **ISOs podem ser baixadas do nosso [site](https://download.bazzite.gg), com um guia de instalao conveniente disponvel [aqui](https://docs.bazzite.gg/General/Installation_Guide/).** Rebaseie de uma instalao existente de Fedora Atmico para esta imagem se voc quiser **Drivers de GPU Open Source**: (Nota: A soluo Open Source Mesa para GPUs NVIDIA, NVK ainda propensa a erros quando esta orientao redigida, pra qualquer problema pertinente NVK [por favor mande um relatrio ao projeto Mesa]([url](https://docs.mesa3d.org/bugs.html)), no ao Ublue/Bazzite) ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite:stable ``` ou para dispositivos com GPUs Nvidia caso os **Drivers Proprietrios da NVIDIA** convirem: ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-nvidia:stable ``` **Usurios com o Secure Boot ativado:** Sigam nossa [documentao para secure boot](#secure-boot) antes do rebase. ### Steam Deck/PCs Centros de Mdia (HTPCs) > [!IMPORTANT] Dispositivos que NO SO o Steam Deck tambm podem usar as imagens `bazzite-deck`, mas precisam ter uma GPU recente da AMD. GPUs Arc da Intel tambm foram confirmadas como funcionando. Imagem feita pra ser utilizada como alternativa ao SteamOS no Steam Deck, e para uma experincia semelhante a consoles em HTPCs, disponvel como `bazzite-deck`: - Inicializa diretamente no Game mode, assim como o SteamOS. - **`duperemove` automtico reduz bastante o tamanho da compatdata.** - **A ltima verso do Mesa cria caches de shader menores e no requer seu uso pra prevenir travamentos.** - **Inicia mesmo se o disco estiver cheio.** - **Suporte a todos os idiomas suportados pelo Fedora.** - **Usa o desktop em Wayland com [suporte a Steam Input](https://github.com/Supreeeme/extest).** - Inclui o [HHD](https://github.com/hhd-dev/hhd) para suporte expandido de entrada pra portteis que no so da Valve. - Contm verses da maioria dos pacotes nativos do SteamOS, incluindo drivers, atualizadores de firmware, e controladores de ventoinha [do repositrio evlav](https://gitlab.com/evlaV). - Mesa com patches pra suportar controle de taxa de quadros via Gamescope. - Vem com patches do [SteamOS BTRFS](https://gitlab.com/popsulfr/steamos-btrfs) pra suporte completo a BTRFS no carto SD por padro. - Inclui uma verso do [SDGyroDSU](https://github.com/kmicki/SteamDeckGyroDSU), habilitada por padro. - Opes pra instalar o [Decky Loader](https://github.com/SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-loader), [EmuDeck](https://www.emudeck.com/), [RetroDECK](https://retrodeck.net/), e [ProtonUp-Qt](https://davidotek.github.io/protonup-qt/), entre outros vrios programas teis na instalao. - Um sistema de atualizao customizado permite que o sistema, Flatpaks e imagens Distrobox sejam atualizados diretamente pela interface do Game mode via [ublue-update](https://github.com/ublue-os/ublue-update) e [topgrade](https://github.com/topgrade-rs/topgrade). - Suporte padro a dual-boot com Windows j que a instalao de GRUB do Fedora mantida intacta. - Uma atualizao quebrou alguma coisa? Volte facilmente pra verso anterior do Bazzite graas funcionalidade de rollback do `rpm-ostree`. Voc pode at selecionar imagens anteriores na sequncia de boot. - Steam e Lutris pr-instalados via pacotes sobrepostos na imagem. - [Discover Overlay](https://github.com/trigg/Discover) pra Discord pr-instalado e iniciado automaticamente tanto no Game mode quanto no Desktop se o Discord estiver instalado. [Confira a documentao oficial aqui](https://trigg.github.io/Discover/bazzite). - Usa ZRAM(4GB) com o algoritmo de compresso ZSTD por padro com a opo de trocar de volta para um arquivo de swap de 1GB e definir um tamanho arbitrrio pra ele se desejado. - Inclui os schedulers de CPU [BORE](https://github.com/firelzrd/bore-scheduler) e [LAVD](https://crates.io/crates/scx_lavd) para uma experincia de gameplay suave e responsiva. - Scheduler de I/O Kyber para prevenir inanio de I/O ao instalar jogos ou durante o processo de `duperemove` rodando em segundo plano. - Aplica os parmetros de kernel do SteamOS. - Perfis de cor calibrada para as telas padro e antirreflexo do Steam Deck inclusos. - Recursos para usurios avanados e desabilitados por padro, incluindo: - Um servio para undervolt de baixo risco do Steam Deck assim como laptops Framework com AMD via [RyzenAdj](https://github.com/FlyGoat/RyzenAdj) e [Ryzen SMU](https://gitlab.com/leogx9r/ryzen_smu), vide `ryzenadj.service` e `/etc/default/ryzenadj`. - Um servio para limitar o nvel mximo da carga da bateria, vide `batterylimit.service` e `/etc/default/batterylimit`. (Funciona mesmo se o dispositivo estiver desligado) - Suporte a overclocking de tela. Por exemplo, escreva `CUSTOM_REFRESH_RATES=30-68` em `/etc/environment`. Taxas de atualizao mnima e mxima mudam de porttil pra porttil! - Modificou seu Steam Deck pra ter 32GB de RAM? Aproveite o dobro da quantia mxima de VRAM, aplicada automaticamente. (Quer emprestar esse talento com solda?) - Servios especficos para o hardware do Steam Deck podem ser desabilitados rodando `ujust disable-bios-updates` e `ujust disable-firmware-updates` no terminal. Eles so desabilitados automaticamente em hardware que no seja o Deck, e em Decks com telas DeckHD ou mods de 32GB de RAM. - Mais informaes sobre as imagens Bazzite Steam Deck podem ser encontradas [aqui](https://docs.bazzite.gg/Handheld_and_HTPC_edition/Steam_Gaming_Mode/). > [!WARNING] > **Devido a um bug upstream, o Bazzite no pode ser utilizado em Steam Decks com 64GB de armazenamento eMMC no momento. Fazer um upgrade de armazenamento resolve o problema.** > [!IMPORTANT] > **ISOs podem ser baixadas do nosso [site](https://download.bazzite.gg), com um guia de instalao conveniente disponvel [aqui](https://docs.bazzite.gg/General/Installation_Guide/).** Pra fazer rebase de uma instalao existente de Fedora Atmico para esta imagem: ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-deck:stable ``` #### Portteis Alternativos Por favor confira nossa [wiki pra portteis](https://docs.bazzite.gg/Handheld_and_HTPC_edition/Handheld_Wiki/) pras mudanas de configurao necessrias e plugins do Decky Loader pro Steam Gaming Mode do seu porttil especfico. **Certifique-se de ler a [documentao do hhd](https://github.com/hhd-dev/hhd#after-install), alguns portteis requerem mudanas de configurao/ajustes especficos pra funcionar corretamente.** Ns tambm inclumos comandos `ujust` para instalar vrios temas pra [CSS Loader](https://docs.deckthemes.com/CSSLoader/Install/#linux-or-steam-deck) que no se encontram na loja do CSS Loader. Esses temas so atualizados automaticamente com o Bazzite se instalados. ```bash # Para instalar o tema Handheld Controller (https://github.com/victor-borges/handheld-controller-glyphs) ujust install-hhd-controller-glyph-theme ``` ### GNOME Imagens com o ambiente desktop GNOME esto disponveis pra ambas as verses desktop & deck. Estas variantes trazem os seguintes recursos adicionais: - [Suporte a taxa de atualizao varivel e escala fracionada de aplicativos habilitadas em Wayland](https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/mutter/-/merge_requests/1154). - Menu customizado no painel para retornar ao game mode, iniciar a Steam, e abrir alguns utilitrios. - [GSConnect](https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1319/gsconnect/) pr-instalado e pronto pra usar. - [Extenso Hanabi](https://github.com/jeffshee/gnome-ext-hanabi) inclusa pra obter funcionalidades semelhantes ao Wallpaper Engine pro KDE. - Vrias extenses opcionais pr-instaladas, incluindo [correes importantes para a experincia de usurio](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbCg9_YgKgM). - Atualizaes automticas para o [tema GNOME pro Firefox](https://github.com/rafaelmardojai/firefox-gnome-theme) e o [tema GNOME pro Thunderbird](https://github.com/rafaelmardojai/thunderbird-gnome-theme). (Se instalados) > [!IMPORTANT] > **ISOs podem ser baixadas do nosso [site](https://download.bazzite.gg), com um guia de instalao conveniente disponvel [aqui](https://docs.bazzite.gg/General/Installation_Guide/).** Pra fazer rebase de uma instalao existente de Fedora Atmico para esta imagem: ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-gnome:stable ``` Pra fazer rebase de um sistema ostree existente para uma verso com Ambiente Desktop e os **Drivers Proprietrios da NVIDIA**: ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-gnome-nvidia:stable ``` > [!WARNING] > **Devido a um bug upstream, o Bazzite no pode ser utilizado em Steam Decks com 64GB de armazenamento eMMC no momento.** Pra fazer rebase de um sistema ostree existente para a verso **Steam Deck/HTPC**: ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-deck-gnome:stable ``` **Usurios com o Secure Boot ativado:** Sigam nossa [documentao para secure boot](#secure-boot) antes do rebase. ### Recursos Upstream #### Universal Blue - Drivers proprietrios da Nvidia pr-instalados. (Apenas nas imagens Nvidia) - Flathub habilitado por padro. - Comandos [`ujust`](https://github.com/casey/just) pra sua convenincia. - Codecs multimdia inclusos. - Faa rollback para qualquer verso do Bazzite dos ltimos 90 dias. #### Recursos do Fedora Linux (Kinoite & Silverblue) - Base bastante slida e estvel. - Pacotes do sistema relativamente atualizados. - Capacidade de sobrepor pacotes Fedora sobre a imagem sem perd-los em atualizaes. - Focado em segurana com o [SELinux](https://github.com/SELinuxProject/selinux) pr-instalado e configurado por padro. - Capacidade de mudar a base do sistema entre imagens diferentes de Fedora Atmico, se desejado, sem perder dados de usurio. - Suporte a impressora graas ao [CUPS](https://www.cups.org/) pr-instalado. ## Porqu O Bazzite comeou como um projeto pra resolver alguns dos problemas que afligem o SteamOS, particularmente pacotes desatualizados (apesar da base Arch) e a falta de um gerenciamento de pacotes funcional. Apesar deste projeto tambm ser baseado em imagens, voc pode instalar qualquer pacote Fedora direto do terminal. Estes pacotes vo persistir entre atualizaes (Ento v em frente e instale aquele software desconhecido de VPN que voc gastou meia-hora tentando fazer funcionar no SteamOS). Inclusive, o Bazzite atualizado vrias vezes por semana com os pacotes dos repositrios Fedora, trazendo a melhor peformance possvel e os ltimos recursos - tudo numa base estvel. O Bazzite inclui a verso mais recente do kernel Linux e vem com SELinux habilitado por padro com suporte total a secure boot (Execute `ujust enroll-secure-boot-key` e insira a senha `universalblue` se requisitada para adicionar a nossa chave) e criptografia de disco, fazendo dele uma soluo razovel pra computao em geral. (Sim, voc pode usar sua impressora no Bazzite) Confira o [FAQ](https://docs.bazzite.gg/General/FAQ/) para mais detalhes no que faz o Bazzite ser diferente de outros sistemas operacionais Linux. ## Status](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/kylegospo/webapp-manager/package/webapp-manager/status_image/last_build.png?) | ## Verificao As imagens so assinadas com o [cosign](https://docs.sigstore.dev/cosign/overview/) da sigstore. Voc pode verificar essa assinatura baixando a chave `cosign.pub` deste repositrio ao rodar o seguinte comando: ```bash cosign verify --key cosign.pub ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite ``` ## Secure Boot > [!WARNING] > **Usurios do Steam Deck: O Steam Deck no habilita o secure boot e no vem com quaisquer chaves inclusas por padro. No ative se no tiver certeza absoluta de que sabe o que est fazendo.** Secure boot suportado com a nossa chave prpria. A chave pblica se encontra [aqui](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/blob/main/secure_boot.der) na raiz deste repositrio. Se voc quiser adicionar a nossa chave antes da instalao ou rebase, baixe a chave e execute o seguinte: ```bash sudo mokutil --timeout -1 sudo mokutil --import secure_boot.der ``` Para usurios que j esto numa imagem Universal Blue, s rodar `ujust enroll-secure-boot-key`. Se uma senha for pedida, insira `universalblue`. ### Mtricas de Contribuio ![Bazzite](https://repobeats.axiom.co/api/embed/86b500d79c613015ad16f56df76c8e13f3fd98ae.svg "Repobeats analytics image") #### Histrico de Estrelas ## Agradecimentos Especiais O Bazzite um esforo comunitrio e no existiria sem o apoio de todos. Listados abaixo esto algumas das pessoas que nos ajudaram pelo caminho: - [rei.svg](https://github.com/reisvg) - Por criar nossa logo e branding no geral. - [SuperRiderTH](https://github.com/SuperRiderTH) - Por criar o nosso vdeo de inicializao pro Steam game mode. - [evlaV](https://gitlab.com/evlaV) - Por disponibilizar o cdigo da Valve e por ser [essa pessoa](https://xkcd.com/2347/). - [ChimeraOS](https://chimeraos.org/) - Pelo gamescope-session e pela valiosa ajuda ao longo do caminho. - [Jovian-NixOS](https://github.com/Jovian-Experiments) - Por nos ajudar com problemas tcnicos e por criar um projeto similar. Srio, vai l conferir. o nosso primo baseado em Nix. - [sentry](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/) - Por ajudar com patches de kernel necessrios e por criar o [repositrio kernel-fsync](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/kernel-fsync/) que ns usamos agora. - [nicknamenamenick](https://github.com/nicknamenamenick) - Por ser o MVP mantendo toda a nossa documentao e biblioteca de suporte quase sozinho, e ajudar usurios inmeras vezes. - [Steam Deck Homebrew](https://deckbrew.xyz) - Por escolher suportar distribuies alm do SteamOS apesar do trabalho adicional, e um agradecimento especial ao [PartyWumpus](https://github.com/PartyWumpus) por fazer o Decky Loader funcionar com o SELinux pra gente. - [cyrv6737](https://github.com/cyrv6737) - Pela inspirao inicial e a base que se tornou o bazzite-arch. ## Faa Sua Prpria O Bazzite construdo inteiramente no GitHub e criar sua prpria verso customizada to simples quanto fazer um fork deste repositrio, adicionar uma chave privada pra assinatura, e habilitar as GitHub actions. [Se familiarize](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/security-guides/encrypted-secrets) com o uso de segredos no github. Voc vai precisar [gerar um novo par de chaves](https://docs.sigstore.dev/cosign/overview/) com o cosign. A chave pblica pode ficar no seu repositrio pblico (Seus usurios precisam dela pra verificar a assinatura), e voc pode colar a chave privada em `Settings -> Secrets -> Actions` com o nome `SIGNING_SECRET`. Ns tambm inclumos uma configurao pro app popular [pull](https://github.com/apps/pull) se voc quiser manter seu fork sincronizado com o upstream. Habilite esse app no seu repositrio pra ficar a par das mudanas no Bazzite enquando mantm suas prprias modificaes. ## Junte-se Comunidade - Voc pode falar conosco no [Discord do Universal Blue](https://discord.gg/f8MUghG5PB) - Visualize o [acervo](https://www.answeroverflow.com/c/1072614816579063828/1143023993041993769) de postagens de suporte, sem precisar de uma conta. - Discuta e crie guias de usurio nos [Fruns Discourse do Universal Blue](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/c/bazzite/5). - Siga o Universal Blue no [Mastodon](https://fosstodon.org/@UniversalBlue). [**Veja a lista completa das mdias sociais e documentao do Bazzite**](https://docs.bazzite.gg/Resources/).

--- # Table des matires - [Table des matires](#table-des-matires) - [ propos et fonctionnalits](#-propos-et-fonctionnalits) - [Environnement de bureau](#environnement-de-bureau) - [Steam Deck/Home Theater PCs (HTPCs)](#steam-deckhome-theater-pcs-htpcs) - [Consoles portables alternatives](#consoles-portables-alternatives) - [GNOME](#gnome) - [Fonctionnalits provenant d'autres sources](#fonctionnalits-provenant-dautres-sources) - [Universal Blue](#universal-blue) - [Fonctionnalits de Fedora Linux (Kinoite & Silverblue)](#fonctionnalits-de-fedora-linux-kinoite--silverblue) - [Pourquoi](#pourquoi) - [Vitrine](#vitrine) - [Documentation et newsletters](#documentation-et-newsletters) - [Packages personnaliss](#packages-personnaliss) - [Vrification](#vrification) - [Secure Boot](#secure-boot) - [Mtriques des contributeurs](#mtriques-des-contributeurs) - [Historique des toiles](#historique-des-toiles) - [Remerciements spciaux](#remerciements-spciaux) - [Construisez le vtre](#construisez-le-vtre) - [Rejoignez la communaut](#rejoignez-la-communaut) --- ## propos et fonctionnalits [Veuillez consulter notre site web](https://bazzite.gg/) pour une explication conviviale de Bazzite destine aux nouveaux utilisateurs. Ce fichier readme couvrira tout en dtail. [Bazzite](https://bazzite.gg/) est une image OCI qui sert de systme d'exploitation alternatif pour le [Steam Deck](https://www.steamdeck.com/), et est un SteamOS-like prt l'emploi pour les ordinateurs de bureau et les PC Home Theater. Bazzite est construit partir de [ublue-os/main](https://github.com/ublue-os/main) et [ublue-os/nvidia](https://github.com/ublue-os/nvidia) en utilisant la technologie de [Fedora](https://fedoraproject.org/), ce qui signifie que le support matriel tendu et les pilotes intgrs sont inclus. De plus, Bazzite ajoute les fonctionnalits suivantes : - Utilise le [noyau fsync](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/kernel-fsync/) pour obtenir la prise en charge HDR et un support matriel tendu, ainsi que de nombreux autres correctifs. - HDR disponible en mode jeu. - NVK disponible sur les builds non-Nvidia. - Support complet des codecs matriel pour le dcodage H264. - Support complet pour les runtimes OpenCL/HIP ROCM d'AMD. - Pilote [xone](https://github.com/medusalix/xone) pour les contrleurs Xbox. - Support complet pour [DisplayLink](https://www.synaptics.com/products/displaylink-graphics). - Comprend le thme KDE de Valve issus de SteamOS. - Thmes optionnels GTK3/4 inspirs de celui de Valve, correspondant Vapor et VGUI2 de SteamOS. Installez [Gradience](https://flathub.org/apps/com.github.GradienceTeam.Gradience) pour les utiliser. - [LatencyFleX](https://github.com/ishitatsuyuki/LatencyFleX), [vkBasalt](https://github.com/DadSchoorse/vkBasalt), [MangoHud](https://github.com/flightlessmango/Mangohud), et [OBS VkCapture](https://github.com/nowrep/obs-vkcapture) installs et disponibles par dfaut. - [Switcheroo-Control patch](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/switcheroo-control_discrete/) pour corriger le basculement iGPU/dGPU cass par dfaut. - Support pour [Wallpaper Engine](https://www.wallpaperengine.io/en). (Seulement sur KDE) - [Extension de shell ROM Properties Page](https://github.com/GerbilSoft/rom-properties) incluse par dfaut. - Support complet pour [Winesync/Fastsync/NTsync](https://github.com/Frogging-Family/wine-tkg-git/issues/936). - [Distrobox](https://github.com/89luca89/distrobox) prinstall avec mises jour automatiques pour les conteneurs crs. - [Ptyxis Terminal](https://gitlab.gnome.org/chergert/ptyxis) est utilis par dfaut dans toutes les images. Ce terminal est spcialement conu pour le workflow des conteneurs dans Bazzite. Pour revenir au terminal d'origine, excutez `ujust _restore-original-terminal`. - Service automatis `duperemove` pour rduire l'espace disque utilis par les contenus du prfixe wine. - Support pour HDMI CEC via [libCEC](https://libcec.pulse-eight.com/). - [System76-Scheduler](https://github.com/pop-os/system76-scheduler) prinstall, fournissant des ajustements automatiques de priorit des processus pour l'application focalise, gardant le temps CPU pour les processus en arrire-plan au minimum. - Configuration personnalise de System76-Scheduler avec des rgles supplmentaires. - Utilise par dfaut [BBR TCP congestion control de Google](https://github.com/google/bbr). - [Input Remapper](https://github.com/sezanzeb/input-remapper) prinstall et activ par dfaut. (Disponible mais dsactiv par dfaut sur la variante SteamDeck, peut tre activ avec `ujust _restore-input-remapper`) - Bazzite Portal offrant un moyen facile d'installer de nombreuses applications et ajustements, y compris l'installation de [LACT](https://github.com/ilya-zlobintsev/LACT) et [GreenWithEnvy](https://gitlab.com/leinardi/gwe). - [Waydroid](https://waydro.id/) est prinstall pour excuter des applications Android. Configurable avec ce [guide rapide](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=32). - Gre les applications avec [Flatseal](https://github.com/tchx84/Flatseal), [Warehouse](https://github.com/flattool/warehouse), et [Gear Lever](https://github.com/mijorus/gearlever). - [OpenRGB](https://gitlab.com/CalcProgrammer1/OpenRGB) pilotes i2c-piix4 et i2c-nct6775 pour contrler le RGB sur certaines cartes mres. - Pilotes [OpenRazer](https://openrazer.github.io) intgrs, slectionnez OpenRazer dans Bazzite Portal ou excutez `ujust install-openrazer` dans un terminal pour commencer l'utiliser. - Rgles udev [OpenTabletDriver](https://opentabletdriver.net/) intgres, avec la suite logicielle complte installable via Bazzite Portal ou en excutant `ujust install-opentabletdriver` dans un terminal. - Prise en charge prte l'emploi des claviers [Wooting](https://wooting.io/). - Prise en charge intgre pour les GPU AMD Southern Islands (HD 7000) et Sea Islands (HD 8000) sous le pilote `amdgpu`. - [XwaylandVideoBridge](https://invent.kde.org/system/xwaylandvideobridge) est disponible pour le partage d'cran Discord sur Wayland. - [Webapp Manager](https://github.com/linuxmint/webapp-manager) est disponible pour crer des applications partir de sites web pour une varit de navigateurs, y compris Firefox. ### Environnement de bureau De nombreuses variantes communes sont disponibles sous le nom `bazzite`, adapte aux ordinateurs de bureau. - Mises jour automatiques pour le systme d'exploitation, les Flatpaks et tous les conteneurs Distrobox - propulses par [ublue-update](https://github.com/ublue-os/ublue-update) et [topgrade](https://github.com/topgrade-rs/topgrade). > [!IMPORTANT] > **Les ISOs peuvent tre tlcharges depuis notre [page de versions](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/releases), et un guide d'installation utile peut tre trouv [ici](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=30).** Rebase d'un Fedora Atomic existante de cette image est disponible ici avec des **pilotes GPU Open Source** : (Remarque : l'option Open Source de Mesa pour les GPU NVIDIA, NVK, est encore sujette des erreurs au moment de la rdaction. Pour tout problme li NVK, [merci de soumettre un rapport Mesa]([url](https://docs.mesa3d.org/bugs.html)), pas Ublue/Bazzite) ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite:stable ``` ou pour les appareils avec des GPU Nvidia voulant les **pilotes propritaires NVIDIA** : ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-nvidia:stable ``` **Pour les utilisateurs avec Secure Boot activ :** Suivez notre [documentation sur le dmarrage scuris](#dmarrage-scuris) avant de faire le rebase. ### Steam Deck/Home Theater PCs (HTPCs) > [!IMPORTANT] Les appareils qui NE sont PAS des SteamDeck peuvent toujours utiliser les images `bazzite-deck`, mais doivent utiliser un GPU AMD moderne. Les GPU Intel Arc ont galement t confirms comme fonctionnels. Variante conue pour tre utilise comme alternative SteamOS sur le SteamDeck, et pour une exprience de console sur les HTPCs, disponible sous le nom `bazzite-deck` : - Dmarre directement en mode jeu, correspondant au comportement de SteamOS. - **Le `duperemove` automatique rduit considrablement la taille des compatdata.** - **La dernire version de Mesa cre des caches de shaders plus petits et n'en ncessite pas pour viter les saccades.** - **Peut tre dmarr mme si le disque est plein.** - **Prise en charge de toutes les langues prises en charge par Fedora.** - **Utilise Wayland en mode bureau avec [support pour SteamInput](https://github.com/Supreeeme/extest).** - Inclut [HHD](https://github.com/hhd-dev/hhd) pour un support d'entre tendu sur les consoles portables non-Valve. - Propose la plupart des packages SteamOS, y compris les pilotes, les mises jour de firmware et les contrleurs du ventilateur [du dpt evlaV](https://gitlab.com/evlaV). - Mesa patch pour un contrle appropri du framerate par Gamescope. - Livr avec des patches de [SteamOS BTRFS](https://gitlab.com/popsulfr/steamos-btrfs) pour un support complet de BTRFS pour le lecteur carte SD. - Livr avec une copie de [SDGyroDSU](https://github.com/kmicki/SteamDeckGyroDSU), activ par dfaut. - Option pour installer [Decky Loader](https://github.com/SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-loader), [EmuDeck](https://www.emudeck.com/), [RetroDECK](https://retrodeck.net/), et [ProtonUp-Qt](https://davidotek.github.io/protonup-qt/), ainsi que de nombreux autres packages utiles lors de l'installation. - Le systme de mise jour personnalis permet de mettre jour directement depuis l'interface du mode jeu grce [ublue-update](https://github.com/ublue-os/ublue-update) et [topgrade](https://github.com/topgrade-rs/topgrade). - Prise en charge intgre du dual-boot Windows en laissant l'installation du GRUB de Fedora intacte. - Une mise jour casse quelque chose ? Reviennez facilement la version prcdente de Bazzite grce la fonctionnalit de rollback de `rpm-ostree`. Vous pouvez mme slectionner les images prcdentes au dmarrage. - Steam et Lutris prinstalls dans l'image en tant que packages superposs. - [Discover Overlay](https://github.com/trigg/Discover) pour Discord prinstall et lanc automatiquement la fois en mode jeu et sur le bureau si Discord est install. [Consulte la documentation officielle ici](https://trigg.github.io/Discover/bazzite). - Utilise ZRAM(4GB) avec l'algorithme de compression ZSTD par dfaut, avec la possibilit de revenir un fichier swap de 1GB et de dfinir une taille personnalise si ncessaire. - Planificateur d'E/S Kyber pour viter la starvation des E/S lors de l'installation de jeux ou pendant le processus de `duperemove` en arrire-plan. - Applique les paramtres du noyau de SteamOS. - Profils d'affichage calibrs en couleur pour les crans mats et rflchissants du SteamDeck inclus. - Fonctionnalits pour utilisateurs avancs dsactives par dfaut, notamment : - Service pour l'undervolting faible risque du SteamDeck ainsi que des ordinateurs portables AMD via [RyzenAdj](https://github.com/FlyGoat/RyzenAdj) et [Ryzen SMU](https://gitlab.com/leogx9r/ryzen_smu), voir `ryzenadj.service` et `/etc/default/ryzenadj`. - Service pour limiter le niveau de charge maximal de la batterie, voir `batterylimit.service` et `/etc/default/batterylimit`. (Fonctionne mme lorsque l'appareil est teint) - Support intgr pour l'overclocking d'affichage. Par exemple, ajoutez `GAMESCOPE_OVERRIDE_REFRESH_RATE=40,70` `/etc/environment`. - Vous avez modifi votre SteamDeck avec 32 Go de RAM ? Profitez du double de la quantit maximale de VRAM, appliqu automatiquement. (Pourriez-vous partager vos comptences en soudure ?) - Les services spcifiques au matriel du SteamDeck peuvent tre dsactivs en excutant `ujust disable-bios-updates` et `ujust disable-firmware-updates` dans le terminal. Ils sont automatiquement dsactivs sur le matriel non-Deck, et sur les Decks avec des crans DeckHD ou des mods de 32 Go de RAM. - Plus d'informations peuvent tre trouves [ici](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=37) sur les images Bazzite pour SteamDeck. > [!WARNING] > **En raison d'un bug amont, Bazzite ne peut pas tre utilis sur les SteamDecks avec 64 Go de stockage eMMC pour le moment. La mise niveau du stockage rsout le problme.** > [!IMPORTANT] > **Les ISOs peuvent tre tlcharges depuis notre [page de versions](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/releases), et un guide d'installation utile peut tre trouv [ici](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=30).** Rebase d'un Fedora Atomic existante avec cette image : ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-deck:stable ``` #### Consoles portables alternatives Merci de consulter notre [Wiki des consoles portables](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=1038) pour les modifications de paramtres ncessaires et les plugins Decky Loader pour le mode jeu Steam sur votre console portable spcifique. **Assurez-vous galement de lire la [documentation de hhd](https://github.com/hhd-dev/hhd#after-install), certaines consoles portables ncessitent des modifications/tweaks spcifiques pour fonctionner correctement.** Nous avons galement des commandes `ujust` pour installer divers thmes [CSS Loader](https://docs.deckthemes.com/CSSLoader/Install/#linux-or-steam-deck) qui ne se trouvent pas sur le magasin CSS Loader. Ceux-ci seront automatiquement mis jour avec Bazzite s'ils sont installs. ```bash # Installer le thme Manette de jeu portable (https://github.com/victor-borges/handheld-controller-glyphs) ujust install-hhd-controller-glyph-theme ``` ### GNOME Les versions avec l'environnement de bureau GNOME sont disponibles en versions desktop et deck. Ces versions incluent les fonctionnalits supplmentaires suivantes : - Prise en charge du taux de rafrachissement variable et du scaling fractionn activs sous Wayland, voir [ici](https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/mutter/-/merge_requests/1154). - Menu personnalis dans la barre suprieure pour revenir au mode jeu, lancer Steam et ouvrir plusieurs utilitaires utiles. - GSConnect est prinstall et prt l'emploi, voir [ici](https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1319/gsconnect/). - Extension Hanabi incluse pour offrir des fonctionnalits similaires Wallpaper Engine sous KDE, voir [ici](https://github.com/jeffshee/gnome-ext-hanabi). - Nombreuses extensions optionnelles prinstalles, y compris des correctifs importants pour l'exprience utilisateur, voir [ici](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbCg9_YgKgM). - Mises jour automatiques pour le thme GNOME de [Firefox](https://github.com/rafaelmardojai/firefox-gnome-theme) et le thme GNOME de [Thunderbird](https://github.com/rafaelmardojai/thunderbird-gnome-theme), s'ils sont installs. > [!IMPORTANT] > **Les ISO peuvent tre tlcharges depuis notre [page de releases](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/releases), et un guide d'installation utile est disponible [ici](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=30).** Pour rebaser un systme ostree existant vers cette image : ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-gnome:stable ``` Pour rebaser un systme ostree existant vers une version avec l'environnement de bureau **Proprietary NVIDIA Drivers** : ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-gnome-nvidia:stable ``` > [!WARNING] > **En raison d'un bug en amont, Bazzite ne peut pas tre utilis sur les Steam Decks avec un stockage eMMC de 64 Go pour le moment.** Pour rebaser un systme ostree existant vers la version **Steam Deck/HTPC** : ```bash rpm-ostree rebase ostree-unverified-registry:ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite-deck-gnome:stable ``` **Pour les utilisateurs avec Secure Boot activ :** Suivez notre [documentation sur le Secure Boot](#secure-boot) avant de rebaser. ### Fonctionnalits provenant d'autres sources #### Universal Blue - Pilotes Nvidia propritaires prinstalls. (Uniquement pour les images Nvidia) - Flathub activ par dfaut. - Commandes [`ujust`](https://github.com/casey/just) pour plus de commodit. - Codecs multimdia inclus ds l'installation. - Possibilit de revenir en arrire sur Bazzite partir de n'importe quelle version des 90 derniers jours. #### Fonctionnalits de Fedora Linux (Kinoite & Silverblue) - Base solide et stable. - Packages systme relativement jour. - Possibilit de superposer des packages Fedora l'image sans les perdre entre les mises jour. - Orient scurit avec [SELinux](https://github.com/SELinuxProject/selinux) prinstall et configur par dfaut. - Capacit de rebaser sur diffrentes images Fedora Atomic, si dsir, sans perte de donnes utilisateur. - Prise en charge de l'impression grce l'installation prinstalle de [CUPS](https://www.cups.org/). ## Pourquoi Bazzite a dbut comme un projet visant rsoudre certains des problmes qui affectent SteamOS, principalement les packages obsoltes (malgr une base Arch) et le manque d'un gestionnaire de packages fonctionnel. Bien que ce projet soit galement bas sur des images, vous pouvez installer n'importe quel package Fedora directement depuis la ligne de commande. Ces packages persisteront travers les mises jour (Alors n'hsitez pas installer ce logiciel VPN obscur sur lequel vous avez pass une heure essayer de le faire fonctionner sous SteamOS). De plus, Bazzite est mis jour plusieurs fois par semaine avec des packages de Fedora, vous offrant ainsi les meilleures performances possibles et les dernires fonctionnalits - le tout sur une base stable. Bazzite est livr avec le dernier noyau Linux et SELinux activ par dfaut, avec prise en charge complte du dmarrage scuris (Excutez `ujust enroll-secure-boot-key` et entrez le mot de passe `universalblue` si vous tes invit enregistrer notre cl) et du chiffrement des disques, en faisant une solution raisonnable pour l'informatique gnrale. (Oui, vous pouvez imprimer depuis Bazzite) Consultez la [FAQ](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=33) pour plus de dtails sur ce qui distingue Bazzite des autres systmes d'exploitation Linux. ## Vitrine ![KDE Vapor Theme](/repo_content/desktop1.png?raw=true "KDE Vapor Theme") ![KDE VGUI2 Theme](/repo_content/desktop2.png?raw=true "KDE VGUI2 Theme") ![Steam Game Mode](/repo_content/gamemode.png?raw=true "Steam Game Mode") ![Waydroid](/repo_content/waydroid.png?raw=true "Waydroid") ![Distrobox Terminals](/repo_content/distrobox.png?raw=true "Distrobox Terminals") ![GNOME Vapor Theme](/repo_content/gnome1.png?raw=true "GNOME Vapor Theme") ![GNOME VGUI2 Theme](/repo_content/gnome2.png?raw=true "GNOME VGUI2 Theme") ## Documentation et newsletters - [Installation et gestion des applications](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=35) - [Mises jour, rollback et rebasage](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=36) - [Guide de jeu](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/docs?topic=31) Consultez la [documentation supplmentaire](http://docs.bazzite.gg/) concernant le projet. Dcouvrez nos [Newsletters](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/tag/bazzite-buzz) publis rgulirement pour les mises jour sur le projet. ## Packages personnaliss Les paquets ports de SteamOS et Status](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/kylegospo/webapp-manager/package/webapp-manager/status_image/last_build.png?) | ## Vrification Ces images sont signes avec [cosign](https://docs.sigstore.dev/cosign/overview/) de sigstore. Vous pouvez vrifier la signature en tlchargeant la cl `cosign.pub` depuis ce dpt et en excutant la commande suivante : ```bash cosign verify --key cosign.pub ghcr.io/ublue-os/bazzite ``` ## Secure Boot > [!WARNING] > **Utilisateurs de Steam Deck : Le Steam Deck ne vient pas avec le secure boot activ et n'inclut pas de cls inscrites par dfaut. Ne l'activez pas moins de savoir parfaitement ce que vous faites.** Le secure boot est pris en charge avec notre cl personnalise. La cl publique peut tre trouve la racine de ce dpt [ici](https://github.com/ublue-os/bazzite/blob/main/secure_boot.der). Si vous souhaitez inscrire cette cl avant l'installation ou le rebasage, tlchargez la cl et excutez les commandes suivantes : ```bash sudo mokutil --timeout -1 sudo mokutil --import secure_boot.der ``` Pour les utilisateurs dj sur une image Universal Blue, vous pouvez plutt excuter `ujust enroll-secure-boot-key`. Si on vous demande un mot de passe, utilisez `universalblue`. ### Mtriques des contributeurs ![Bazzite](https://repobeats.axiom.co/api/embed/86b500d79c613015ad16f56df76c8e13f3fd98ae.svg "Image d'analyse Repobeats") #### Historique des toiles ## Remerciements spciaux Bazzite est un effort communautaire et ne serait pas possible sans le soutien de chacun. Voici quelques personnes qui nous ont aids tout au long du chemin : - [rei.svg](https://github.com/reisvg) - Pour la cration de notre logo et de notre identit visuelle. - [SuperRiderTH](https://github.com/SuperRiderTH) - Pour la cration de notre vido de dmarrage du mode jeu Steam. - [evlaV](https://gitlab.com/evlaV) - Pour avoir rendu le code de Valve disponible et pour tre [cette personne](https://xkcd.com/2347/). - [ChimeraOS](https://chimeraos.org/) - Pour gamescope-session et pour un soutien prcieux tout au long du projet. - [Jovian-NixOS](https://github.com/Jovian-Experiments) - Pour le support technique et la cration d'un projet similaire bas sur Nix. Allez voir, srieusement. - [sentry](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/) - Pour l'aide avec les correctifs du noyau ncessaires et pour avoir cr le repo [kernel-fsync](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sentry/kernel-fsync/) que nous utilisons maintenant. - [nicknamenamenick](https://github.com/nicknamenamenick) - Pour maintenir quasiment seul notre documentation et notre littrature de support, et pour avoir aid d'innombrables utilisateurs. - [Steam Deck Homebrew](https://deckbrew.xyz) - Pour choisir de soutenir des distributions autres que SteamOS malgr le travail supplmentaire, et un merci spcial [PartyWumpus](https://github.com/PartyWumpus) pour avoir fait fonctionner Decky Loader avec SELinux pour nous. - [cyrv6737](https://github.com/cyrv6737) - Pour l'inspiration initiale et la base qui est devenue bazzite-arch. ## Construisez le vtre Bazzite est entirement construit sur GitHub et crer votre propre version personnalise est aussi simple que de forker ce dpt, ajouter une cl de signature prive et activer les actions GitHub. [Familiarisez-vous](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/security-guides/encrypted-secrets) sur la gestion des secrets dans GitHub. Vous devrez [gnrer une nouvelle paire de cls](https://docs.sigstore.dev/cosign/overview/) avec cosign. La cl publique peut tre dans votre repo public (Vos utilisateurs en ont besoin pour vrifier les signatures), et vous pouvez coller la cl prive dans `Paramtres -> Secrets -> Actions` avec le nom `SIGNING_SECRET`. Nous expdions galement une configuration pour l'application populaire [pull app](https://github.com/apps/pull) si vous souhaitez synchroniser votre fork avec l'original. Activez cette application sur votre repo pour suivre les modifications de Bazzite tout en apportant vos propres modifications. ## Rejoignez la communaut Vous pouvez nous trouver sur le [Discord Universal Blue](https://discord.gg/f8MUghG5PB) et consulter les [archives](https://www.answeroverflow.com/c/1072614816579063828/1143023993041993769) des discussions de support sans compte. Discutez et crez des guides utilisateur sur les [forums Universal Blue Discourse](https://universal-blue.discourse.group/c/bazzite/5). Suivez Universal Blue sur [Mastodon](https://fosstodon.org/@UniversalBlue).
